title: Mediterranean noodles
description: Spaghetti noodles with seafood and spices, a specialty of the cuisine. Warning: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

title: House noodles
description: Pasta with seafood and spices, a specialty of the cuisine. Warning: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

description: Fettuccine noodles with chili sauce and spices.

description: House salad (lettuce, arugula, carrots) with salmon.

description: Beef steak (150g) on ​​the grill, with fries. Comes with rice and sauces.

description: 400g of chopped picanha, with grilled vegetables and pasta chosen by the customer.

description: Salad with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpeas and more.

title: Meatballs
description: Portion of meatballs with sour cream, onion and seasonings. Comes with rice or pasta.
